column9: One of the best in Lund

This place is so good I'm quite hesitant to give it a review here, because that will mean that more people find this place!

I have reached Ihsiri with a colleague of mine without booking. The place is nice in one of the narrow streets in the city center. Nice quality of the offered food. Kind staff. Price/quality ratio very very good

Great little restaurant. We shared several dishes including the papaya salad, rib mix, the green curry dish and one of the vegetarian dishes. Their sauces were very flavorful, with spices true to Thai cuisine. The staff were very friendly. I would love to eat here...More

We had baby and spicy ribs as main dish. They were okay but nothing special. Consider visiting other places if you are thai cousine fan. No Wifi was available.

column9: Delicious food for all of us

column9: Very good Thai restaurant that also has a large selection of vegan alterantives
column11: This was a surprisingly nice Thai restaurant. I had their Pad Thai with king prawns and it was delicious. They also have a nice selection of beers. The atmosphere is nice and the staff is very friendly and service-minded. I had ice cream for dessert...More

In Scandinavia, Thai has become the new Chinese. This also means that many Thai restaurants serve OK, but boring food. Not so here. This is special, and worth every kroner you spend there! Good selection of beers, too.

This restaurant is surprisingly good. We tried a variety of dishes and found that it was all either very good or excellent. Highly recommend if you like Asian or just enjoy a good meal. Very nice and friendly staff too made this an enjoyable experience.
My family and I enjoyed a really good dinner! The best asian food I have eaten since I don't know when! Great service and ambiance! Looking forward to come back again. :)

I was out with my girlfriends and we had a really good time. Nice wine, friendly service and delicious food. We had the summer rolls, always nice, and I had the steamed fish (sea-bass I think), and it was splendidly cooked.
Hade lunch this week. The food was great and the price is nice. Good service also. Can recommend the place.

这家店就在法学院边上，吃过两次了。亚洲风味是他们家特色。春卷用料足，酱料很东南亚，趁热吃口感颇好。照烧鸡肉串是日料做法，我也很中意。主菜里面肋排应该是主打，似乎两次吃小伙伴不约而同都点了辣的（主菜第二道）。辣就是微辣偏香辣，肉感非常柔软，用刀子很容易就能把肉片下来，且不嵌牙。配沙拉和米饭，米是亚洲米，吃起来舒服。

总之缺点是价格高，偶尔吃一次至少味道还是很对得起这个价的。饭点生意很好。

I love the spring rolls, chicken and spicy ribs here!  To eat here is a little bit expensive but it worths. Service is nice and you can pay your own part which is really convenient.

We ended up here since close to the hotel.
Staff speaks english very well. All plates are asian or have asian influence.
I had duck with asian influence and was very tasteful. 
Big beer choice. Limited wines.

I have visit this restaurant on several occasions and have always got very tasty and well prepared dishes. I can highly recommend a visit to Ihsiri if you are looking for a lovely Thai food served in a typical Scandinavian environment.
We were four of us that dined this evening and all of us was very satisfied with the food and friendly service. Every plate served was nicely set and tasted superb.

column9: Very good food and excellent service

The finest dining in Lund, to a good price! Every time I go there I get surprised by the beautiful and tasty food. The service and the surrounding is also perfect. I would reccomend this place for any occation.

column9: Exciting mix between Asian and Swedish food
column11: Very nice atmosphere. Good and friendly  service and excellent food, that mixes Asian  and European cooking. The lokation in an old house in central Lund, on a quiet street between the Central  station, the University building and the Cathedral, is excellent.
Very nice place with a plaseant backyard. Good food and non-alcoholic beverages is very interesting. Ice cream is a must- to- taste.

column9: Great lunch with good flavours a reasonable price
column11: We had a great lunch with family. There were four alternatives to choose (fish, pork, chicken and vegetarian). Very friendly service and good cosy atmosphere. If you like Asian food this is a place to visit.

The place was packed at 7 p.m. when we arrived and we had not reserved a table. However we went away and returned 45 minutes later and was able to receive a table then. The service was very friendly and the food was wonderful. We...More

This is a place with image of modern or advanced thai. However if you think about the normal thai food - this is something very different. High class. Went there with family on four. Started with sharing several appetizers (their special spring rolls, chicken, wonton...More

Just across from the Hotel were we stayed we discovered this wonderful restaurant where great service and coffee refills are part of the deal. (To my partners great pleasure!)
Unfortunately we'd just eaten but the venue and menu looked so delicious and tempted us to...More
The food served at Ihsiri was superb. It's authentic Thai food with very nice presentation. The staff were attentive and friendly. It's worth our 1.5 hour drive:-) I highly recommend this place.

column9: Delicious Thai food and pleasant surroundings
column11: The food was very, very good and the restaurant clean, classy and cozy! I highly recommend it! The staff was also very nice.

Loved the food. Great quality ingredients and excellent præsentation. The restaurant was full and we came without a reservation. We got lucky and there was a last minute cancellation. Great experience. Can highly recommend.
The first thing that impressed me is that my order didn't take a long time at all and above all, it was a tasty dish indeed.

column9: So so so so so good
column11: My favourite place to eat in Lund! Creative and (pleasantly) surprising food every time! A big plus for the vegan options, too. Also, the mango dessert is the best dessert I've ever had
The food here is simply delicious. The service is great, the portions are huge and the desserts are amazing.  It's a bit pricey, but definitely worth it!

I ordered their zucchini noodles with red curry and enjoyed every bite! It was also beautifully served. The staff were super friendly and really cared about making it a good experience.

column9: On a rainy Sunday this restaurant gave us our sunshine.

You know, I just love when you walk into a place, tired as .... from just being a toddler dad and you feel right at home. Your greeted with a warm friendly smile and a caring touch.

We did not have a lot of time so we just took Dish of the day, sitting in the backyard. Cosy, sunny, nice staff and good food. Fried pork with a salad and its Thai tastes. Perfect on a hot day!
Had lunch with the family here last year. They cater for babies with high chairs and change table (stocked with wipes and nappies). Food was very tasty. Dessert was also amazing.

column9: Nice lunch near the central station

Visited Ishiri for dinner with a group of collegues. Since we were a group of 8, we booked the table a week ahead. We were well treated by the staff who took our orders promptly. The menu is not large but they do everything extremely...More

column9: Best Thai food outside of Thailand

Very pleasant staff, nice small inner garden. A small amount of dishes on the menu but interesting. We chose starter svala sommarrullar and they were very good and fresh. Main dish:spicy southern ribs  were really spicy, grillad oxfile med grön curry sås - the sauce...More

I was not disappointed with our visit. Delicious food, good servings and cozy for a lunch celebration 🍾 
The waitress was able to recommend from the menu and made sure we had a good time.

I thought we would receive tiny portions of food in large plates, but Ihsiri proved me wrong. 
We have received great service, got all our questions answered patiently and sincerely.
If you want to have a taste of Thai food without Swedish influence, try this...More

Ihsiri was so good that I ate both lunch and dinner here the same day! A choosy ambience, attentive service and really nice Asian inspired food.
Recommended!

My husband and I decided to try this restaurant and were not disappointed, in spite of walking there on a rainy evening!  The baby-back ribs, rice and slaw were wonderful as well as their Mango-Tango Dessert, one of their specialties.

I had lunch here with a friend, and everything was just lovely! Excellent value for money, definitely recommend. The food was so good we ended up having lunch there the day after, too! Also, the terrace is nice and the service impeccable.

This restaurant is an excellent and indeed even a necessary choice for any visitor to Lund. Asian fusion, heavily Thai but with some Japanese influence as well, not necessarily what one might expect but it is very very good. This is a very popular spot...More

Arrived without a booking at 1830 on a Wednesday.  Welcomed and sat immediately in the conservatory area.  Good service, and good tasty food (spicy ribs and Pad Thai).  An enjoyable meal, well recommended.

This was our third visit at Ihsiri and the food was just as delicious as previously. We were here to celebrate our marriage anniversary and decided to have a bottle of prosecco. We had expected to get a wine cooler for the bottle, but the...More
Restaurant has a lovely style, friendly staff and great food. Perfect for business as well as private dinners. If you are in Lund, you should definitely go there

The food was very delicious, not to much to choose from which I think it is good. It seems like the put a lot of effort to make the dishes they have very good. The waiter was very nice, he presented the food and did...More

It is a very cosy place centrally located. It is an old house and they have kept end some old elements like the fireplaces. 
The menu is not long but it has all the options - fish, meat, veggie. 
Mango tango is a must at...More

column9: One of the best in Lund
column11:
We go there frequently with my friends for lunch and sometimes for dinner, it’s our favorite Asian restaurant in Lund for the following reasons: 
1. Food is great and the flavours are cleverly created , with a very beautiful presentation.

Amazing Thai food in the centre of Lund. Thai food with a twist of high class preparation - not an everyday combination.

This place is so good I'm quite hesitant to give it a review here, because that will mean that more people find this place! 
Went here to have a glass of wine with a colleague and to check out the Place after renovations and change...More
This place is well worth a visit when in Lund. The Thai inspired food is delicious and the athmosphere is very much influenced by students. Very good service and not expensive.

Excellent food in a not-so-fancy restaurant. Ihsiri serves a rather limited menu, but the dishes are delicious. It's not too pricey for what they serve and it's a very good place to go out to for a dinner with friends. The restaurant has a pleasant...More

I have reached Ihsiri with a colleague of mine without booking. The place is nice in one of the narrow streets in the city center. Nice quality of the offered food. Kind staff. Price/quality ratio very very good

Very nice, and different from the usual thai restaurants in scandinavia (also a little pricier). Properly spicy and combined with local ingredients, so not traditional thai either. I had the spicy ribs, look forward to try some of the other dishes on their menu some...More

Great little restaurant. We shared several dishes including the papaya salad, rib mix, the green curry dish and one of the vegetarian dishes. Their sauces were very flavorful, with spices true to Thai cuisine. The staff were very friendly. I would love to eat here...More
The cuisine is Thai but the emphasis is also on fresh ingredients exquisitely prepared. The service is pleasant and attentive without being overbearing.
We had baby and spicy ribs as main dish. They were okay but nothing special. Consider visiting other places if you are thai cousine fan. No Wifi was available.

column9: Delicious food for all of us
column11: We got a recommendation from to go here from the reception in our hotel in Lund, and to say the least we where not disappointed, the restaurant was in center of town and it was quite full when we get there, but then they had...More

Had read the reviews and heard recommendations... unfortunately they did not meet expectations.  Tried to come in first time without a booking. Second time we did fix the booking but was disappointed. Was surprised that a tortilla wrap was served for lunch on a Thai/Asia...More

column9: Very good Thai restaurant that also has a large selection of vegan alterantives
column11: This was a surprisingly nice Thai restaurant. I had their Pad Thai with king prawns and it was delicious. They also have a nice selection of beers. The atmosphere is nice and the staff is very friendly and service-minded. I had ice cream for dessert...More
The lunch was quite good. I had a garlic burger which had a little Thai touch to it. Environment is nice and really central. It's bit pricey though compared to what you get.

In Scandinavia, Thai has become the new Chinese. This also means that many Thai restaurants serve OK, but boring food. Not so here. This is special, and worth every kroner you spend there! Good selection of beers, too.

This restaurant is surprisingly good. We tried a variety of dishes and found that it was all either very good or excellent. Highly recommend if you like Asian or just enjoy a good meal. Very nice and friendly staff too made this an enjoyable experience.
My family and I enjoyed a really good dinner! The best asian food I have eaten since I don't know when! Great service and ambiance! Looking forward to come back again. :)

I was out with my girlfriends and we had a really good time. Nice wine, friendly service and delicious food. We had the summer rolls, always nice, and I had the steamed fish (sea-bass I think), and it was splendidly cooked.

这家店就在法学院边上，吃过两次了。亚洲风味是他们家特色。春卷用料足，酱料很东南亚，趁热吃口感颇好。照烧鸡肉串是日料做法，我也很中意。主菜里面肋排应该是主打，似乎两次吃小伙伴不约而同都点了辣的（主菜第二道）。辣就是微辣偏香辣，肉感非常柔软，用刀子很容易就能把肉片下来，且不嵌牙。配沙拉和米饭，米是亚洲米，吃起来舒服。

总之缺点是价格高，偶尔吃一次至少味道还是很对得起这个价的。饭点生意很好。

I love the spring rolls, chicken and spicy ribs here!  To eat here is a little bit expensive but it worths. Service is nice and you can pay your own part which is really convenient.

We ended up here since close to the hotel.
Staff speaks english very well. All plates are asian or have asian influence.
I had duck with asian influence and was very tasteful. 
Big beer choice. Limited wines.

I have visit this restaurant on several occasions and have always got very tasty and well prepared dishes. I can highly recommend a visit to Ihsiri if you are looking for a lovely Thai food served in a typical Scandinavian environment.
We were four of us that dined this evening and all of us was very satisfied with the food and friendly service. Every plate served was nicely set and tasted superb.

We picked this restaurant randomly, simply running a cross-check with TA to ensure the reviews were decent enough. And gosh, what a nice dinner we had!!! Everything from the springrolls we shared for starters to the service were immaculate. We had a variety of mains,...More

På besök med ett gäng vänner fick vi ett helt eget litet rum vilket passade oss strålande. Personlig och påpasslig...More

column9: Best and tastiest meal in Lund

Met a friend for a nice Monday-Night Dinner to enjoy and talk. The food was extremely good (both had veg option) and the guys working there were very helpful.

Had a very tasty vegetarian dish there last Saturday at lunch time. Perfect food and very good service.

The finest dining in Lund, to a good price! Every time I go there I get surprised by the beautiful and tasty food. The service and the surrounding is also perfect. I would reccomend this place for any occation.

column9: Very nice new restaurant experience in Lund
column11:

Nice athmosphere and very friendly and personal staff! The duck was amazing! I will most definitely be back!

column9: Asian Fusion - great taste but at a price
column11: I can only speak for the vegetarian dish, but it was very fresh and tasty, with an appealing plating. The only downside it was the price - a bit spicy, but overall worth it.

Nice and different food. Nice staff. Worth a visit if you are in Lund. Nice space. You maybe need to book a table to be sure to have a place.

Big menu for such a little place. We shared two starters and four mains. Each dish was distinct and delicious. The space is divided so that you almost feel like you are in a private room. Friendly and relaxed service. Good beer menu and wine...More

We had lunch here. Prime location in Lund. The food was ok, but I was not so impressed, maybe because I am actually not a big fan of Thai food. However, the deco inside the restaurant was nice.

column9: Incredible Thai food in the heart of Lund

column11: Stopped by during a warm day and had a nice glass of wine on a terrace - nice summer and vegetarian roles, great service
If you want to have excelent asian food when visiting Lund ISHIRI is the place. Both owners and staff Will guide you and take excelent care of you.

I loved the rice and the ribs which seemed to melt effortlessly with every bite. The sauce was also amazing. Very nice service... definitely visiting again. You might consider making a reservation in advance.

Excellent dinner!  We arrived after a last-minute decision to see if we could get a table - it was a lovely night, and the owner was able to set us up outside.  Great food, excellent drink selection and suberb service from the owner himself -...More

Absolutely worth it!

Perfect food, very good service. Highly recomended! I wish I had this level restaurant in my home town..

Relatively small and well furnished restaurant close to the main station. Thai, or rather  Asian mixed menu of high quality. Good service but prices are a bit higher than average or expected. Nice as a change of food with good taste.

I absolutely loved this place. A great atmosphere, full of local people, the food was amazing, the staff were so helpful and friendly and the bread and salad were fantastic. I will say that their menu is quite small but that really doesn't matter as...More

column9: One of the best in Lund
column11: Always freshly made fish dishes, well thought taste combinations, and enthusiastic chefs and staff. This is one of my regular lunch places, and it always holds a high quality standard. Definitely one of the best places in Lund (if not THE best).

We always go here when in Lund for their divine Fish Soup.
This time we also timed the Friday Oyster Feast (SEK 10 each!) and we had 24 for us both.
Excellent service and child friendly.

We came to check out the Saluhall lunch options, and easily Malmstens was the cosiest option. They had 2 dishes on offer for lunch, so we had one of each - fish soup and shrimp open sandwich. The fish soup was so lovely - maybe...More

Few mains but very nice: fresh fish, well cooked, good value for money. Quick and nice service. 
Good wine. 
Cosy place in an indoor food market. 
All in all a great experience, will come back!
The restaurant is located in Saluhallen among shop stalls. The fish soup was delicious. Unfortunately the service was very very slow. In other case I would have given 5 stars

column9: First visit to Lund a Fish Bistro of excellence
column11: We were exploring Lund, the Cathedral is worth a visit and came upon the Saluhallen Market, a wonderful food hall of different nations, when we came upon Malmstens Fisk. Snuck into a quiet place in the hall, tight atmospheric seating, you could share a table,...More

We will join the chorus of many reviewers: The best fish soup I have ever had. The small, unassuming restaurant is located in an indoor shopping centre and partnered with a highly regarded fish market. No doors, sort of a food court setting and ambiance,...More

column9: The freshest fish and delicious bread!
column11: My husband and I ate there recently for lunch.  Absolutely the best fish around.  There are maybe two or three choices for lunch, but all all prepared with an expert hand.  We both had the flat fish which was huge and came with a side...More

这里写的周一公休不可信啊，周一去的照样开着。这家店还挺好找的，就在市场去二楼的电梯左手边。餐厅旁边连着鱼摊。

中午过来大家一般都是来喝鱼汤的，99克朗一份，沙拉和面包自助，免费。总之这个量是可以吃得很饱的。

鱼汤的味道，我就跟斯京那家著名鱼汤比一下吧。隆德鱼汤里没有洋葱但有土豆，罗宋汤的味道没那么重，口味层次更丰富些。里面鱼应该是有两种，一种红肉一种白肉，但我亲测鱼肉和海鲜的味道是斯京的好，主要是河鱼有点腥，而且嚼劲也没有斯京鱼肉厚道。

偶尔吃一次不错，多吃会腻。

The fish soup is obviously the major lunch choice in this restaurant. 99kr per set with free bread and salad is a fair price. And it is totally enough for one person.

The soup tastes delicious while the fish is not...More

A great spot in a busy food hall for seafood and wine. We really enjoyed their seafood soup and a daily special of sauteed herring with dill and lingonberries. Easy walk from the Cathedral and main shopping streets.

Located inside the local food market, Malmstens offers a limited choice of dishes in a very informal setting.
The fish is very fresh and the food overall is very good. All for really fair prices. The portions are quite big and filling, plus bread and...More
Friendly service in English for us Canadians, bread, salad and fish soup were Excellent. Shrimp sandwich was ok, so get the soup!

Malmstens fisk's restaurant is mostly a restaurant for lunch at weekdays but there are someone there that is a genius about how to compose different and very delicious dishes on fish. We have had our lunch there a lot of times now and it have...More

column9: You must eat the Fish soup
column11: Great enviroment, super good service and delicious fish soup. Goes very well in the winter days for lunch or dinner with friends or couples. Very good house white wine. Recommended when in Lund!

Every time I visit Lund I go here for a long lunch with friends.
Most of the times I order the fish soup and it is really the best Fish Soup I ever have eaten and with fantastic bread to accompany the soup.

We found this place purely by chance, on a half day visit from Malmo- what a discovery! The staff kindly translated the menu into English for us and we chose the dish of the day. It combined flavours and ingredients in the most imaginative way,...More

column9: Fiskdisken, great service and very knowledgeable staff

column9: Very good fish and friendly+quick service
column11: This was a very good Swedish "Saluhal"-experience. We had salmon (course of the day) and the fish soup, green salad, bread and mineral water. The meal was good value for money and service was both friendly and quick.
Not very much to choose, but both the fish soup and the scrimp samwiches were worth the prøve. Service mindre staff

column9: Quite probably the best place to eat fish (in Lund)
column11: While the local might not be to everyone's taste the food will bring a smile to fish lovers faces. A perfect place to take lunch at when in Lund

column9: best fish stew i've had in my many years

column9: Swedish fish house in the Saluhall

As always great service and great food. Very rarely am I disappointed in the slightest. Certainly the best spot for a fish based lunch in Lund.

column9: Superb fish soup, service was good

column9: I'd go there again and again...

column9: One of the best cafés in Lund!

column9: Best value for money in town

column9: A nice change from the usual sushi/thai
column11:
Lund is one of those university towns that is most affected by food trends. Now when sushi and thai are "in", the town is flooded with those. That is why it is refreshing with a place like Fengssons which do something different.  
Dumpling and Dim...More

Have been going to Fengssons since they opened! They are very friendly and standards have kept the same. Great value for money! 
Their chili sauce is amazing! I always ask for extra... their coconut soup is refreshing

这家煎饺店就在法学院后门出来二十米，好像是四川人开的。门面不太起眼，要往地下走。店里面也很小，只有几张桌子。但人气一直挺旺的。

饺子的话，我吃过的有猪肉、鸡肉、素菜，可以随意组合，10个69克朗，15个89克朗。除此之外还可以在米饭、面条、米粉中选一个主食，再选一个蘸饺子的酱料，价钱包括在内。提供免费的汤，味道很像冬阴功。

饺子的味道还是可以的，个人喜欢稍微焦一点的，口感比较脆。素菜的那个做得有点面，以致我再也没尝试过第二次。最推荐面条米粉配的那个酱料，和上面撒的花生脆，真的好吃。

除了堂食，食物也可以打包带走，每一个都有单独的盒子，餐具自取，很方便。

感觉老板娘对自家食物和服务的质量要求都挺高的，每次去都听到她不是在数落这个店员就是在数落那个。希望他们的饺子能一直保持好的品质...

For dumplings, you can choose from pork, chicken and vegan, as you like, with rice or noodles as well as a sauce. Free soup. 69kr for 10. 89kr for 15. Taste is fine. Noodles are delicious.

We were craving for fresh dumplings for lunch and got what we were looking for. The level of service was also good. Value for money.

这家自助餐中午的时候很热门，往往还没开门就排起了长长的队。当然如果提前去排队，十一点半一开门一般都能第一批进去吃。这家店写着是不收现金的，接受信用卡，午市105克朗一位。

作为主打亚洲菜的餐厅，菜品种类还是挺丰富的。主要分成：1.东南亚菜和中餐。我尤其推荐糖醋排骨，每次都吃得意犹未尽。尖椒牛肉也不错，里面有胡萝卜片和杏鲍菇（还是茭白）。主要菜品不变，偶尔会换几个菜。2.点心。有蒸饺小馒头之类的，味道一般。虾片还可以。西式的有面包。3.寿司。属于基本款寿司，种类不太固定，但像虾啊蟹肉棒啊福袋啊总是会有的。4.沙拉区。沙拉常见的蔬果都有，还有黄桃菠萝这些比较特别的。5.饮料区。除了可乐等常规饮料外，莓果汁可能是这边的特色。供应咖啡和茶。6.甜点和冰淇淋区。吃到最后一步了，来个香蕉球甜品（不过我一般吃不下这个了），再自制一个冰淇淋，你能想到的能撒在冰淇淋上的一切这里都有，还有多种果酱巧克力酱可供选择。

午市开到三点，我能慢慢吃上一个半小时（然后这天就再也吃不下别的了）。餐厅里也一直坐得满满的。总体而言，这家店性价比挺高的，留着肚子来吧。这里还提供一次性筷子，吃中餐很方便了。

This place is always crowded at lunch time (11:30-15:00). You can enjoy a fairly good buffet for 105kr (no cash).  A variety of asian food, including sushi, are provided. Also, you can help yourself with salad, drinks, ice-cream as you like.
If you love cardamon buns this is the place to go. Fantastic. Better take them with you as there are very limited seats in the cafe

This restaurant is so cosy and romantic!
